class CIccMruCmm
 

Detailed Description

Type: Class

Purpose: Defines a class that provides and interface for applying pixel transformations through a CMM. Multiply CIccCmmApply objects can use a single CIccCmm Object.

Member Function Documentation

icStatusCMM CIccApplyMruCmm::Apply ( icFloatNumber *  DstPixel,
const icFloatNumber *  SrcPixel 
)
virtual

Name: CIccMruCmm::Apply

Purpose: Apply a transformation to a pixel.

Args: DstPixel - Location to store pixel results SrcPixel - Location to get pixel values from

Return: icCmmStatOk if successful

Reimplemented from CIccApplyCmm.

References CIccCmm::Apply(), icCmmStatOk, m_cache, m_nCacheSize, m_nDstSize, m_nSrcSamples, m_nSrcSize, m_nTotalSamples, m_pCachedCmm, m_pFirst, m_pixelData, CIccMruPixel::pNext, and CIccMruPixel::pPixelData.

virtual

Name: CIccMruCmm::Apply

Purpose: Apply a transformation to a pixel.

Args: DstPixel - Location to store pixel results SrcPixel - Location to get pixel values from nPixels - number of pixels to convert

Return: icCmmStatOk if successful

Reimplemented from CIccApplyCmm.

bool CIccApplyMruCmm::Init ( CIccCmm *  pCachedCmm,
icUInt16Number  nCacheSize 
)
protected

Name: CIccApplyMruCmm::Init

Purpose: Initialize the object and set up the cache

Args: pCmm - pointer to cmm object that we are attaching to. nCacheSize - number of most recently used transformations to cache

Return: true if successful

References CIccCmm::GetDestSamples(), CIccCmm::GetSourceSamples(), m_cache, m_nCacheSize, m_nDstSize, m_nNumPixel, m_nSrcSamples, m_nSrcSize, m_nTotalSamples, m_pCachedCmm, CIccApplyCmm::m_pCmm, m_pFirst, and m_pixelData.
